entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add Accelerators to all Visual Elements #16202
  • Invoking async swift code in an iOS binding library is returning an objective C encoding error #16199
  • Custom webviewhandler keeps getting event of DisconnectHandler in a continuous loop #16198
  • Label not respecting Font Family setup if using FormattedText #16193
    Backlog
  • [WinUI] Grid Bug !! #16190
  • Android "No compatible code running on the thread" and crash after hit continue #16189
  • Cannot download a Visual Studio App Extension #16188
  • [Windows, Blazor] Review currently failing Windows tests #16187
  • MAUI BlazorWebView does not support backgroundcolor in iOS #16186
  • Rotating ContentView #16185
    Backlog
  • Rare error occuring in the wild #16184

Closed

  • .Net MAUI CollectionView slows down when SectionHeadersPinToVisibleBounds is true in iOS platform . #16062
  • [Documentation] Frame IsClippedToBounds Property Default Value #16044
  • Update Nuget dependencies to latest versions #16098
  • [iOS] Grid layout not working good on iPhone SE #16148
  • Baidu Push SDK: No implementation found for void crc6488302ad6e9e4df1a.MauiApplication.n_onCreate() #16142
    Backlog
  • [Enhancement] Allow selecting of specific target frameworks. #2939
    Backlog
  • Base page events no longer works #9468
    Backlog
  • ListView not displaying until I swipe the screen #10453
    Backlog
  • MediaPicker.CapturePhotoAsync crash on the Kyocera C6930 #10508
    Backlog
  • Declare the windows.protocol usage of the protocol/scheme `https` in your AppxManifest.xml file" #16172
  • Linux support #16183
  • Android app doesn't build if project location path has a dot #15963

PullRequests

Created

  • iOS Keyboard Scrolling - MCT Popup Scrolling Fix #16201
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Consolidate all the testing things #16200
  • Bump the androidx group with 14 updates #16194
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • Enable WinUI Core Tests on CI #15885
    area/testing
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16033
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add VS Feedback and VS Code links to bug report template list #16121
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump powershell from 7.3.5 to 7.3.6 #16167
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Updated

  • Start docs for UITesting #15836
    area/testing
  • Stop DispatcherTimer after Tick fires if IsRepeating is false #16173
    .NET 8 GA
  • Prevent Android timer from adding multiple callbacks #16078
  • Make Add/Remove Logical public #16046
    area/layout 🔲, area/navigation 🧭, area/shell 🐢, area/collectionview 📃, area/controls 🎮, area/FlyoutPage, area/modal, control-swipeview, area/ListView, control-border
  • Publish ControlGallery to run tests #15194
    area/testing
  • Bump the xunit group with 3 updates #16113
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Text needs to be set before other properties #16116
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Fix issue loading images from Stream #16162
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-image
  • [Bug] Fixes content sizing issue found on ios for the ScrollView #16048
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨
  • Fix issues with ScrollView on ios that does not correctly resize when… #15460
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨
  • [iOS] Changes in Border clipping part #15856
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-border, i/regression
  • [Android] Fix issue invoking ReturnCommand #14972
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Fix Label Multilinetruncation (MaxLines / LineBreakMode) #14918
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • [iOS] Fix ScrollTo method issues #15984
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, layout-scrollview
  • PanGesture notify Completed event moving outside View limits #15700
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/gestures
  • Revert default for UseSafeAreaProperty to value from .NET 6 for iOS #16093
    backport/suggested
  • Style specificity #13818
    area/Xaml </>
  • [controls] fix memory leak with Grid Row/ColumnDefinitions #16145
    layout-grid, memory-leak 💦
  • Bump the aspnetcore group with 7 updates #16114
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Make WinUI FilePicker FutureAccessList more robust #16026
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [Android] Fix issue setting CarouselView position on Ctor or Appearing #16165
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃
  • Android Ecosystem 20230714 net7.0 nuget bumps fix issue 16074 type renaming #16176
  • [Android] Fix Button IconSize #16164
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, control-image
  • [Windows] Allow to customize the Shell FlyoutIcon #14663
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢
